plot: Freddy is a young writer of horror stories for children. Looking for inspiration, he enters in the most unusual places. But Freddy never imagined that his search will take him to live his own horror story.
title: Muerte cerebral
plot_es: Freddy is a young writer of horror stories for children. Looking for inspiration, he enters in the most unusual places. But Freddy never imagined that his search will take him to live his own horror story.
plot_en: Freddy is a young writer of horror stories for children. Looking for inspiration, he enters in the most unusual places. But Freddy never imagined that his search will take him to live his own horror story.
